About Me

Hello! I'm Lorenzo Shaikewitz, a Caltech student studying mechanical engineering. I built this site to keep track of my research and personal projects through college. It contains:
  • Information about some of my recent research
  • Pictures, thoughts, and technical information related to various projects I'm working on
  • Other, random things I thought deserved a spot on a website
Feel free to reach out to me by email: lorenzo AT caltech.edu
Designed by Lorenzo Shaikewitz in 2021
